article_title: Long legacy of giving ties Steinmans to Lancaster community
article_text: Susan Baldrige is an investigative reporter for Lancaster Newspapers. She can be reached at sbaldrige@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6135. You can also follow @sbaldrige on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , steinman foundation, james hale steinman, john frederick steinman, lancaster newspapers, boys club and girls club of lancaster, peggy steinman, pamela thye, andrew jackson steinman, carolina nunan, carrie nunan hill, hale ansberry krasne, robert krasne, spanish american civic association, carlos graupera, stevens college of technology
article_metadata.author: SUSAN BALDRIGE | Staff Writer

og.description: Two foundations, which are merging, have donated to more than 330 local organizations and have contributed about $79 million.
